## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`make test` and `go test ./...`)
- [ ] New/changed behavior is covered by tests
- [ ] Documentation updated (USAGE.md, DESIGN.md, or README) if applicable
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated under `[Unreleased]` if user-facing
